form.configurationDescription: Define how this pricing option should behave.

form.depositHint: Deposit required at the time of booking.
form.minimumRentalHint: Minimum number of rental days required for this pricing to apply.
form.neverExpiresHint: This pricing will remain active indefinitely without an expiration date.
form.neverExpiresHelper: This pricing will remain active indefinitely without an expiration date.
form.validFromHint: Set when this pricing becomes active.
form.tagsSuggestion: Use tags like "seasonal", "weekend", or "holiday" to organize this pricing.
form.defaultHelper: Each vehicle can have one default pricing. Setting a new default overrides any existing one for overlapping dates.

offering.inventorySettingsHelp: Configure how this offering's availability is tracked. EXCLUSIVE items can only be booked by one customer at a time, while SHARED items allow multiple concurrent bookings based on available quantity.

inventoryMode.sharedDesc: Multiple bookings can rent this offering for overlapping dates (quantity-based tracking)
inventoryMode.exclusiveDesc: Only one booking can have this offering at a time (date-range blocked)

consumableType.returnableDesc: Physical item returned after booking (e.g., GPS, child seat)
consumableType.consumableDesc: One-time purchase consumed during booking (e.g., full tank, toll pass)
consumableType.serviceDesc: Service provided during booking (e.g., chauffeur, airport pickup)

offering.exclusiveNote: Exclusive offerings can only be booked by one customer at a time. Availability and max quantity are automatically set to 1.
offering.exclusiveAvailabilityNote: Exclusive offerings have a fixed availability of 1.
offering.purchaseLimitsHelp: Set limits on how many times this offering can be added to a single booking. Useful for consumable items like fuel or one-time services.
offering.purchaseLimitDescription: Maximum times this offering can be added to a single booking. Leave empty for no limit.
offering.consumableLimitSuggestion: Tip: Consumable items typically have a purchase limit of 1 per booking.
offering.noBookingsDescription: This offering has not been used in any bookings yet.

toast.createDescription: The discount has been created successfully.

form.percentageHelper: Enter the discount percentage between 0 and 100.
form.selectPackagesDescription: Choose which packages this discount applies to. Leave empty to apply to all packages.
form.selectOfferingsDescription: Choose which offerings this discount applies to. Leave empty to apply to all offerings.
form.bookingScopeHint: Discount will be applied to all bookings.
form.vehicleScopeHint: Discount will be applied to all vehicles.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe how and when this discount should be used...
form.advancedDescription: Configure priority, auto-apply, and combination rules
form.priorityHelper: Higher priority discounts are applied first when multiple discounts are applicable (0-100).
form.autoApplyDescription: Automatically apply this discount without requiring a promo code.
form.requiresPromoCodeDescription: Customers must enter the discount code to use this discount.
form.combinableDescription: This discount can be combined with other discounts.
form.firstTimeOnlyDescription: This discount is only available for first-time customers.
form.autoApplyConflictWarning: Auto-apply and requires promo code cannot both be enabled.

errors.validRangeRequired: Valid from and valid to dates are required.
errors.validRangeOrder: Valid to date must be after valid from date.
errors.percentageRange: Percentage discounts must be between 0 and 100.
errors.amountNegative: Fixed amount discount cannot be negative.
errors.minBookingNegative: Minimum booking amount cannot be negative.
errors.maxUsesMinimum: Maximum uses must be at least 1.
errors.packageRequired: Select a package for this scope.

errors.offeringsRequired: Select at least one offering for this scope.

status.notFoundDescription: You have not set up a merchant account yet.

deleted.title: Stripe Account Deleted
deleted.description: Your Stripe account has been deleted or access has been revoked. You must recreate your account to accept payments.
deleted.point1: A new Stripe account will be created with a new ID
deleted.point2: Previous transaction history will not be transferred
deleted.point3: You will need to complete onboarding again

onboard.title: Start Accepting Payments

overview.message: Your account details have been pre-filled from registration. Click below to launch Stripe onboarding and confirm the remaining steps.

deleted.description: Your Stripe account needs to be recreated
